### Proportions
    
```{r}
tags$div(class="form-group",
         tags$label("First proportion"),
         tags$input(class="form-control",
                    type="number", min="0", max="1", step="0.001",
                    id="p1"))

tags$div(class="form-group",
         tags$label("Second proportion"),
         tags$input(class="form-control",
                    type="number", min="0", max="1", step="0.001",
                    id="p2"))

tags$div(class="form-group",
         tags$label("Significance level"),
         tags$input(class="form-control",
                    placeholder="Alpha level as a proportion (f.i., 0.05)",
                    type="number", min="0", max="1", step="0.001",
                    id="siglevel"))

tags$div(class="form-group",
         tags$label("Power"),
         tags$input(class="form-control",
                    placeholder="Power as a proportion (f.i., 0.8)",
                    type="number", min="0", max="1", step="0.001",
                    id="power"))

tags$div(class="form-group",
         tags$label("Size"),
         tags$input(class="form-control", 
                    type="number", min="0", step="1",
                    id="size"))

tags$div(class="form-group",
         tags$label("Alternative hypothesis"),
         tags$select("form-control",
                     tags$option("Greater", value="greater"),
                     tags$option("Smaller", value="less"),
                     tags$option("Two sided", value="two.sided"),
         id="alternative"))

tags$fieldset(class="form-group",
              tags$legend("Test"),
              tags$div(class="form-check",
                       tags$label(class="form-check-label",
                                  tags$input(value="pwr.p.test",
                                             checked="",
                                             class="form-check-input",
                                             name="pname",
                                             type="radio"),
                                  "One sample")),
              tags$div(class="form-check",
                       tags$label(class="form-check-label",
                                  tags$input(value="pwr.2p.test",
                                             class="form-check-input",
                                             name="pname",
                                             type="radio"),
                                  "Two samples")),
              id="pfunction")

tags$button("Submit", type="submit", class="btn btn-primary", id="ptest")
```
